# What is algae?
Algae is a specalised type of medicine, making use of the anomalous properties of algae on Trieste
While a bit slower than its advanced predecessors, algae is far longer lasting and more efficient, and using temperature modulation chemicals, you can accelerate specific types of healing.
## How to Get
First, you need to make yourself some Algal Feedstock.
This can either be done easily with some nutriment and other elements, or a bit harder without the nutriment
Next, you need some dormant organics. Run some medicine (I recommend inaprov) through a hotplate untill it denatures, then seperate it using the centrifuge.
Once you have both, you can make your first algae culture. You mix 1u of dormant organics, 1u of carbon, 1u of oxygen, and 3u of feedstock. Put that into an incubator (in a vial), and after its done you will have your first batch of activated algae!
